Weihua Zhang is a bioinformatician in the School of Public Health. She has a background in Genetic Epidemiology / Statistical Genetics / Epidemiology, and is interested in applying AI methods to large biobank and omics studies to identify risk factors for disease predicative models and future prevention of diseases.
